name: Tranquil Cove
description:
STORY
Your mother recently passed away, and her mysterious childhood home in a small town called Tranquil Cove was passed down to you. In an attempt to learn about your mothers mysterious past, you go to investigate. Nothing could prepare you for what you find there...

SURVIVE
You are being hunted, by an unknown entity.
Discover the past of the town and the reason you are being hunted.

GAMEPLAY
» Immersive and horrifying story
» Terrifying and intelligent enemy AI
» Expansive and detailed environment
» Chilling ambiance and sound tracks

Can you survive?

WARNING
Tranquil Cove is a horror game containing terrifying environments, themes, and jump scares. Please enjoy!
